0:
--------------------
Text: Hanuman Junction is a 2001 Indian Telugu action comedy film, produced by M. V. Lakshmi on M. L. Movie Arts banner and directed by M. Raja.
Triplets:<Hanuman Junction
3:
--------------------
Text: Hanuman Junction (film):  The film, notably Raja's directorial debut and the only Telugu venture to date, is a remake of the 2000 Malayalam blockbuster "Thenkasipattanam" directed by Rafi Mecartin.
Triplets:<Hanuman Junction
4:
--------------------
Text: Hanuman Junction (film): The film released on 21 December 2001, and became a highly successful venture.
Triplets:<Hanuman Junction
5:
--------------------
Text: Hanuman Junction (film):  This film is dubbed in Tamil "Singakottai" and was released on 5 August 2011.
